channel.title: Rashmi Sirdeshpande on

item.title: Amazing Asia
item.description: The “explain it like I’m 5” primer that more people beyond the age of 5 could appreciate. It’s more thorough, interesting, and engaging than what got taught in school, that’s for sure. ARC kindly provided by the publisher via NetGalley in exchange for an honest review.
